title: Seitan and vegetable stew
ingredients: ['1 small aubergine', '1 small courgette, diced', '2 cloves garlic', '4 banana shallots', 'olive oil, to taste', 'salt and pepper, to taste', '1 jar charred tomatoes', '1 tablespoon powder Marigold bouillion diluted in 300ml water', '1 tablespoon tomato puree', '1 jar seitan, drained', 'a few florets steamed broccoli', '1 handful green beans', '1/2 to 1 teaspoons paprika']
